name: SpellCheckSuggestionsToolbar
desc: The default spell check suggestions toolbar for Android.

fields.name: anchor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.SpellCheckSuggestionsToolbar.anchor} The focal point below which the toolbar attempts to position itself. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: buttonItems
fields.desc: The [ContextMenuButtonItem]s that will be turned into the correct button widgets and displayed in the spell check suggestions toolbar.
